channel.title: Fourier Transforms on Gati Aher's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Fourier Transforms on Gati Aher's Blog

item.title: Spectral Analysis of Bacteria S-Layer
item.description: 1 INTRODUCTION 2 BACKGROUND INFORMATION Bacteria S-Layers FFT In Python Code 3 APPLYING, CLEANING, AND INTERPRETING THE 2D FFT Step 1. Remove Vertical and Horizontal Pattern Noise Step 2. Identify Key Periodic Frequencies Step 3. Calculate Size and Scale Step 4. Identify Shape Bonus: Visualize the S-Layer Units 4 CONCLUSION 1 INTRODUCTION In 2015-2016, Professor Jean Huang and her research group cultured a phototrophic bacteria from the Little Sippewissett Salt Marsh.

item.title: 1D and 2D Fourier Transforms
item.description: 1 INTRODUCTION 2 1D FOURIER TRANSFORM Understanding the 1D Math The DFT-matrix (W) Post Projection Processing Read the 1D Frequency Plots 3 GENERALIZING TO 2D FOURIER TRANSFORM Understand the 2D Math Read the 2D Plots Exercises 4 FURTHER READING 1 INTRODUCTION In the 1800s, Joseph Fourier showed that periodic functions could be written as an infinite sum of sinusoids. His theory paved the way for Fourier Analysis, a useful tool for signal and data processing.
